pages.text: The $(d)Emerald Compass$() can be linked to a player, and  $(3)aims towards them$().$(br2)Of course, it only works if the player is logged in, and is in the same dimension as you.
pages.title: Emerald Compass

pages.text: You can link the Compass to a player in two ways.$(br2)First is to simply right-click them while holding the Compass.$(br2)The other is to craft the Compass with a set $(l:items/player_filter)Player Filter$(/l).
